----- Original Message -----
From: Ron Hartmann
To: TOKEN ; nihontostudy ; nihonto@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, March 02, 2008 11:57 AM
Subject: Bauer Collection catalogue


For anyone owning a copy of the Bauer Collection catalogue, I'm curious what is shown on p.428 regarding a fittings maker named Hironori. A scan of that page or entry would be great, if possible. If so, send it off-list to: swords@...

Thanks!

Ron
STL
